aMazeChallenge There is always a way when you can code!
Game Maze challenge! Select challenge Select color and icon Home Learn Personalize Add player Start game Selected algorithm Algorithm Color Selected colorName Auto play Play Pause Reset Previous Next Interval Name Email Maze name Maze description Add Save Cancel Cancelled About Love the app? Rate us Share Tell the world Share with your friends Version Application API Developed by Get the aMazeChallenge app and learn to code by playing! Get it free from Google Play now: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.inspirecenter.amazechallenge No apps available for sharing http://inspirecenter.org Guest guest@example.com Done Clear Clear code Are you sure you want to erase the code? This action cannot be undone! Are you sure you would like to reset this game? Save code Enter a name for your saved code: The code name cannot be empty. The code name must contain letters and numbers only. Try again Load code Please choose a code to load: Delete code? Delete Are you sure you would like to delete this code? Code deleted. Overwrite code? Overwrite You have already stored code using this name. Would you like to overwrite it? Select colorName> Back to menu About Generate Add to training Edit your code Upload code Maze Designer Number of rewards: Number of penalties: Rewards & Penalties Name: Description: Maze Size Starting Position Target Position Rows: Columns: Row: Column: Wall color: Background image: Maze options: Maze Colors Select color Select image Invalid start/target positions The starting and target positions must be on a different cell. Invalid maze name The maze name cannot be empty. Maze exists The maze you tried to add already exists. Please use another name. Invalid name The maze name you entered is invalid. Please make sure you use only letters and numbers. Αdded to training! Delete challenge Are you sure you would like to delete this challenge? This action cannot be undone. challenge was deleted. Choose an option Maze saved. Edit Background audio Select Discard No code Your code is empty. Please make sure you write code before you attempt to play a maze. Write code
Write your code below to get out of the grid: while (!solved) { Write your code here… } Help Check code Apply Edit your code Submit code Edit code Training Test locally Play online Your code is automatically saved!
